mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( cust_id, frst_reg_dt, frst_reg_id, last_mod_dt, last_mod_id) VALUES ( #{cust_id}, #{frst_reg_dt}, #{frst_reg_id}, #{last_mod_dt}, #{last_mod_id})

INSERT INTO cart_item ( cart_no, prod_no, col_no, qty, frst_reg_dt, frst_reg_id, last_mod_dt, last_mod_id) VALUES ( #{cart_no}, #{prod_no}, #{col_no}, #{qty}, #{frst_reg_dt}, #{frst_reg_id}, #{last_mod_dt}, #{last_mod_id})
mapper.select: SELECT cart_no, cust_id, frst_reg_dt, frst_reg_id, last_mod_dt, last_mod_id FROM orders WHERE cust_id = #{cust_id}

SELECT i.cart_item_no, i.cart_no, i.prod_no, i.col_no, i.qty, p.name prod_name, p.price, c.col_name, i.frst_reg_dt, i.frst_reg_id, i.last_mod_dt, i.last_mod_id FROM cart_item AS i LEFT JOIN prod_col AS c ON i.prod_no = c.prod_no and i.col_no = c.col_no LEFT JOIN product AS p ON i.prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE i.cart_no = #{cart_no} ORDER BY cart_item_no DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE from cart_item WHERE col_no = #{col_no} AND prod_no = #{prod_no} AND cart_no = #{cart_no}
